com.yahoo.labs.samoa.streams.fs

Interface FileStreamSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HDFSFileStreamSource, LocalFileStreamSource

    public interface FileStreamSource
extends Serializable
    An interface for FileStream's source (Local FS, HDFS,...)
    Author:
    Casey

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream getCurrentInputStream()
      Retrieve InputStream for current file.
      InputStream getNextInputStream()
      Retrieve InputStream for next file.
      void init(String path, String ext)
      Init the source with file/directory path and file extension
      void reset()
      Reset the source

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(String path,
        String ext)
        Init the source with file/directory path and file extension
        Parameters:
        path - File or directory path
        ext - File extension to be used to filter files in a directory. If null, all files in the directory are accepted.

      • reset

        void reset()
           throws IOException
        Reset the source
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getNextInputStream

        InputStream getNextInputStream()
        Retrieve InputStream for next file. This method will return null if we are at the last file in the list.
        Returns:
        InputStream for next file in the list

      • getCurrentInputStream

        InputStream getCurrentInputStream()
        Retrieve InputStream for current file. The "current pointer" is moved forward with getNextInputStream method. So if there was no invocation of getNextInputStream, this method will return null.
        Returns:
        InputStream for current file in the list
